content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an expert Bookkeeping, Accounting and Auditing Clerk, some key tasks I would perform related to financial calculations include:

- Calculating amounts due on invoices, purchase orders and vouchers, taking into account any applicable discounts, taxes, shipping charges, etc.
- Determining interest charges on overdue accounts based on established interest rates and timeframes 
- Reconciling account balances and calculating running balances in ledgers and journals
- Calculating available discounts based on early payment terms or volume purchases
- Analyzing owner's equity and calculating the equity position of a business
- Determining loan payments by calculating principal and interest portions based on amortization schedules

Performing these types of detailed financial calculations accurately and efficiently is a core responsibility in bookkeeping and accounting roles to ensure the financial records of the business are correct and up-to-date.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
